pages.text: Mammoths wander the cold landscapes of the Overworld. If TFC is installed, you can find Mammoths alongside Musk Oxen and Alpacas. $(br2)Mammoths can be tamed much like horses and can have saddles, chests, and even carpets.
Carpets will also dye their tusks their respective color. $(br2)When tamed, they can carry up to 3 players. $(br2)Mammoths enjoy: $(br2)Leaves, Wheat, and (TFC)Barley.
